product description: The Ezviz C8C is an easy to connect security camera with manual pan, tilt and digital zoom that will enable you to monitor a wide area, and manage your videos through a well-built app.

product name: Netgear Nighthawk RAXE500 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router
product description: Netgear adds support for the latest 6GHz Wi-Fi 6E standard to its flagship router, which supports throughput of up to 10.8Gbps and 'fast and reliable' connections for up to 60 devices.
The Bagotte BG800 is a nice-looking robot vacuum cleaner with a simple-to-use functional app, remote control, and boundary strip.

As a result of the global pandemic, remote work for office workers became a popular option. Along with the move to working from home, many embraced using mechanical keyboards. With the new Keychron K3 ultra-slim design you can easily tote the keyboard between your home and the office.
Stylish design and solid construction, along with a good specification, put the Spectre x360 14 among the leading 2-in-1 convertibles.

The Nokia X20 offers good battery life, dual SIM support, 5G and a no-frills Android 11 installation, with three years of security updates guaranteed. For all that, it doesn't really do enough to earn a top spot in the competitive mid-range 5G market.

The latest Forerunner model sports unique LTE connectivity, along with all of the great features from the original 945. It may be the best GPS sports watch for those who want to leave the phone behind and benefit from connected safety features.

AfterShokz is known for its bone conduction technology that leaves your ears open to your surrounding environment. The OpenComm headset incorporates a boom mic for an optimal voice communication experience.

product name: Mophie Powerstation Go Rugged Air Compressor
product description: Mophie is known for its power solutions and this new rugged Powerstation product has all you need for your vehicles, boats, bikes, camping trips, and much more. Power, battery charging, air, and light are all provided by the one handy device that should be ready for any emergency situation.

The Surface Laptop 4 offers performance and battery life in a thin-and-light chassis with a wide range of configurations available. There are trade-offs, but in practice you're unlikely to notice them.

Garmin has a number of golf devices designed to track your golf game and help you improve. The Approach G12 is an affordable portable range finder that has enough battery capacity for several rounds of golf.

Apple's new 24-inch iMac has a striking design and delivers similar (impressive) performance-per-watt to its M1-based siblings. It's a desirable AIO, but the M1 Mac Mini offers better value for money.
The Unicima V1-WiFi is an affordable compact projector that is lightweight and looks really portable.
This is a solid little 2-in-1 Chromebook that does double duty as a standalone tablet. Considering the keyboard and kickstand are bundled, it offers very good value for money.

Garmin continues to improve its GPS watch lineup and improves its AMOLED display watch with several new health and wellness features, an improved heart rate sensor, and longer battery life. Support for HIIT workouts, including custom workouts, sets the Venu 2 apart from most other Garmin watches and makes it the perfect sports watch for multi-activity participants.
